name: Everbilt Energy Saver Water Heater Insulation Blanket
description: This water heater blanket helps save energy by making a gas, oil or electric water heater more efficient. This blanket is made from fiberglass backed with foil that enhances insulation without adding excess bulk to the heater. It has an insulation rating of 3.5.California residents: see Proposition 65 informationInsulates water heaterMade of fiberglass backed with foilVersatile for gas, oil and electric water heatersSaves energy
